amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds to implement or enforce the standards established by tables contained in section 325(i)(1)(B) of the Energy Policy and Conservation Act with respect to BPAR incandescent reflector lamps, BR incandescent reflector lamps, and ER incandescent reflector lamps.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to implement or enforce the standards established by tables contained in section 325(i)(1)(B) of the Energy Policy and Conservation Act with respect to BPAR incandescent reflector lamps, BR incandescent reflector lamps, and ER incandescent reflector lamps.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Burgess amendment (A042) Agreed to by recorded vote: 232 - 189 (Roll no. 207).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Burgess amendment (A042) Agreed to by recorded vote: 232 - 189 (Roll no. 207).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A042) offered by Mr. Burgess.
